I offer my solidarity to the Haitian student Getho Mondesir, cowardly attacked in Foz do Iguaçu on Saturday night.
Called monkey, he was accused of being in the country because of the PTs. According to his attackers, now he would have to leave.
Getho holds a degree from Unila (Federal University of Latin American Integration), created by former President Lula in 2010.
The student is another victim of racism, xenophobia and political intolerance, which we must fight against.
We can not allow Brazil to become a country of hatred and intolerance. I hope the case will be investigated and the guilty will be punished.
